Hello there!
I'm Emily Anas.

I’m a developer who likes making pretty things. I study Computer Science at the University of Waterloo.

I worked as a Software Developer at The Home Depot. I have also previously worked at the Ontario Institute for Cancer Research & Reheart, a fashion-based startup.
